headline: 1 Surging  Stock for Long-Term Investors and 2 We Ignore
summary: The stocks featured in this article are seeing some big returns. Over the past month, they’ve outpaced the market due to some combination of positive news, upbeat results, or supportive macro developments. As such, investors are taking notice and bidding up shares.

headline: Is Norwegian Cruise Line Still Attractive After Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: If you are wondering whether Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings is a bargain or a value trap at around $21.65, you are not alone. That is exactly what we are going to unpack here. The stock has jumped 5.3% over the last week and 21.3% over the past month, even though it is still down 16.5% year to date and 14.8% over the last year, while being up 65.6% over three years. Recent moves have been driven by shifting investor expectations around the cruise recovery and ongoing demand for leisure...
